page.title: 05SHEEP FARMING
page.content: I am writing about my farm and the sheep we keep.My dad farms because his parents farmed before him.In the flock of Border Leicester Suffolk cross we have fifty ewes and two rams.The farm consists of twenty acres of land and we use it for grazing the sheep.This year it has been quite a good season for lambing but we do not keep them we send them to the slaughter house. Our oldest sheep is about six and she was one of the first sheep that we had because we reared her from a lamb. Twice a year we have to dip our sheep because if we don't they will get a disease called scab. In the summer we sheer our sheep and we send the wool to the wool board to be made in to yarn.
